title: Grafana's eBPF Beyla Future Hinges on OpenTelemetry
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Grafana has donated Beyla to the OpenTelemetry project, advancing the reach of eBPF for those types of metrics that only it can provide.
cntitle: Grafana 的 eBPF Beyla 的未来取决于 OpenTelemetry
cndescription: Grafana 已将 Beyla 捐赠给 OpenTelemetry 项目，从而扩大了 eBPF 的覆盖范围，使其能够提供只有它才能提供的那些类型的指标。
